5 Bedroom >3,000 sqft Home close to Katy, Sugar Land, Houston

Queen Beds in each of the 5 Bedrooms (1 Bedroom Downstairs).
Large Games Room can be used for Air Mattresses.

The house has a large Kitchen and a comfortable living space. 
Plenty of space for people to stay comfortably.

A great entire home available to rent.

If you have any questions, please don't hesitate to ask :)
